text: Mézin is a commune in the Lot-et-Garonne department in Nouvelle-Aquitaine, south-western France. It is part of the arrondissement of Nerac. ==Geography== The Auzoue flows into the Gélise in the commune. The Gélise forms most of the commune's western border. ==Demography== ==See also== *Communes of the Lot-et- Garonne department ==References== Category:Communes of Lot-et-Garonne
title: Mézin
